title: Mastering Responsive Design in Elementor
description: Create websites that look perfect on all devices using Elementor's responsive features.

blocks.content: In today's mobile-first world, ensuring your website looks great on all devices is crucial. Elementor provides powerful tools for responsive design.

Elementor uses these main breakpoints:

  • Desktop: Default view (> 1024px)
  • Tablet: 768px to 1024px
  • Mobile: < 767px

You can customize these breakpoints in Elementor's global settings.

Key responsive features include:

  • Device-specific visibility
  • Responsive margins and padding
  • Mobile-specific typography
  • Responsive image sizing
  • Column width adjustments
